```{r}
# Create a dataframe containing all file names
df = tibble( filename = list.files(path = "./hw5_data"),
             path = str_c("./hw5_data/", filename))


# Iterate over file names and read in data for each subject 
read_data = function(x) {
  data = read_csv(x)
  }

df = 
  df %>% 
  mutate(data = purrr::map(pull(df,path), read_data)) 

# Tidy the result
df = 
  df %>% 
  unnest(data) %>% 
  separate(filename, into = c("arm", "subject_ID"), sep = 3) %>% 
  mutate(arm = recode(arm, `con` = "control", `exp` = "experiment" ),
         subject_ID = substring(subject_ID,2,3)) %>% 
  select(-path)
```
